Introduction to Pandas

Introduction to pandas module, examples of manipulating tabular data models. Useful in later lessons on data analysis, interpretation, and prediction.

Lesson 8 Original PowerPoint source files developed by ENGR-1330 team for Lesson

Lab8-ReducedSize.ipynb
Excel_ReadingFile.xlsx

concreteData.xls
